name: psychoanalysis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of a number of the theories of the human personality that attempt to examine a person's unconscious mind to discover the hidden causes of their mental problems: Sigmund Freud is known as the father of psychoanalysis. Synonym
analysis
